name: A Place To Park
description:
Created during the week-long Desert Bus For Hope 2018 Game Jam, A Place To Park is an endearing and delightful dating game?

You play as a Desert Bus volunteers posterior looking for a comfy place to sit. But the chairs have come alive! Who will you woo to get the chance of a well-earned rest?

Five routes, six endings and a frankly weird tangent into a horror game later and you will be enthralled or delighted. Or terrified and concerned for my well-being. I don't know your tastes.

Please consider checking out desertbus.org and supporting the excellent work they do in support of Childs Play.
